attributes.action: Pay key workers a higher level of SSP during the corona virus epidemic!
attributes.additional_details: £94 a week will not help staff including nurses, carers working in adult social care with their bills this meaning that they will then face financial hardship due to their roles where as all other workers will be sat at home getting their 80 with no risks to themselves or their families
attributes.background: Currently the government pay people 80% to sit at home where as people working is health and social care only get SSP if the catch the covid 19 bug whilst working and supporting the nation ! I would ask you to double this for key workers

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309104

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
